properties.name: mqtt.host
properties.description: The host the mqtt broker is available under.

properties.name: mqtt.port
properties.description: The port the mqtt broker is available under.

properties.name: mqtt.clientId
properties.description: The client id this component should connect with.

properties.name: mqtt.username
properties.description: The username this component should connect with.

properties.name: mqtt.password
properties.description: The password this component should connect with.

properties.name: mqtt.ssl
properties.description: If ssl should be used for the connection to the mqtt broker.

properties.name: mqtt.clean
properties.description: If the client should connect with a clean session.

properties.name: mqtt.group
properties.description: The optional group subscriptions should be prefixed with.

properties.name: mqtt.version
properties.description: The mqtt protocol version to use.

properties.name: mqtt.connectTimeout
properties.description: The timeout for connection to the broker in milliseconds.

properties.name: mqtt.shutdown
properties.description: The shutdown configuration for the mqtt processor.

properties.name: mqtt.sessionExpiry
properties.description: The session expiry configuration for the mqtt processor in seconds. Using 0 expires the session immediately after disconnect. Using the max value of 4294967295 marks the session as never expiring. Has to be in [0..4294967295]. This setting is only going into effect for MQTT 5.

values.description: The mqtt processor should support graceful shutdown, allowing active tasks time to complete.
The mqtt processor should shut down immediately.
